profile.name: Basil Suhail
profile.title: Data Science & Business Student
profile.bio: Hey, I'm Basil a student at University of Aberdeen [img:/uploads/UoA.png], Scotland [img:/uploads/Scotflag.png]. I spend most of my time integrating Data Science into the world of Accounting & Finance. I'm passionate about Business Management, accessible AI, and building the future of automated financial reporting.

projects.title: Budgeting Schedule Automation
projects.description: Automates 13-worksheet master budgets with instant cross-schedule calculations.

projects.title: AI Investment Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time portfolio analytics with ML-powered market predictions.

projects.title: Data Science Interview Questions
projects.description: Curated collection of DS interview questions with detailed solutions.

experiences.description: My time at Dubizzle was all about finding smarter ways to handle big data. I took a manual process of checking over 1,000 daily payments and sped it up by 25% using Sage 300 and better workflows. I also realized our banking data needed to be clearer for the leadership team, so I cleaned up over 30 ledgers in Google Sheets and used advanced Excel to automate the boring stuff. By the end, I wasn't just reporting numbers; I was helping the team trust them.

This wasn't a standard role, I was awarded this Co-Op placement through a competitive selection process by the Corporate Linkages & Placements Department of The University of Management and Technology. Because of that trust, I was given real responsibility immediately. I managed the monthly financial close for the company, tracked depreciation for over 200 assets, and handled the benefits for the whole team. I also got to play 'detective' with the data, running variance analysis on client accounts to give senior management a clear picture of how the business was actually performing.

items.name: Variance Analysis, Microsoft Dynamics, Strategic Insights

experiences.description: This is where I built my foundation. I learned the ropes of a finance department by processing hundreds of vouchers and making sure every single entry matched the physical tax records. I worked side-by-side with the Finance Manager to close the books at the end of the month and acted as the go-to person for external auditors, ensuring they had every document they needed without delay.

items.name: Audit Coordination, Financial Communication, Data Validation

experiences.description: Gained hands-on exposure to Warehouse Management, Supply Chain Logistics, and Financial Analysis. Assisted in tracking inventory movement and supporting the finance team with daily operational reporting.

certifications.name: Fintech - Semester End Project
certifications.description: Developed a Crypto Currency Wallet app to demonstrate the viability of cryptocurrency in Pakistan. Focused on market research, cost analysis, risk assessment, and future development planning.

certifications.name: Advanced Corporate Reporting
certifications.description: Leveraged IAS-8, IAS-17, IAS-20, IAS-33 guidelines with real-world scenarios. Managed 57+ general entries, prepared ledgers, trial balance, and complete financial statements using Excel.

certifications.name: Management Accounting & Budgeting
certifications.description: Created future outlook budgets using 13 schedules for Shahtaj Sugar Mills Limited. Estimated budgets using inflation and growth rates for authentic forecasting.

certifications.name: Internal Control System Design
certifications.description: Examined and documented internal control frameworks using Draw.io. Mapped procedures across cash, inventory, sales, payroll domains to optimize operations and mitigate risks.

certifications.name: Audit & Assurance - Internal Control Analysis
certifications.description: Assessed 'The Best Laboratories' internal controls for SOP compliance. Evaluated equipment, production, packing, and warehouse security measures.

testimonials.quote: I had the pleasure of working with Basil for a year in the Accounts Receivable team at Bayut | dubizzle. Throughout his time on the team, Basil consistently demonstrated strong attention to detail, professionalism, and a proactive approach to solving problems.

Basil is a young and enthusiastic individual who eagerly tackles challenges head-on. His commitment to his work is commendable, and he has shown great potential in various aspects, particularly in presentation and analytical skills. He approaches tasks with a high degree of professionalism and consistently demonstrates the ability to deliver results effectively.
